title: US Tech Salaries Averaged Above 6 Figures in 2021 - SHRM
content: US Tech Salaries Averaged Above 6 Figures in 2021  SHRM
description: A widespread need for technology professionals drove their average salary to a record high of $104,566 in 2021, with Web developers seeing the biggest increase in pay. Yet nearly half of U.S. tech workers feel they are underpaid.
